p: One of the drawbacks in the success of the treatment of diseases is the resistance that microorganisms develops against the use of conventional medicines, so the need arises to develop antifungal compounds with high activity and low toxicity. For this reason, research is initiated on plants and their components as potential antifungal agents.[ 12 13 14] Traditionally, it has been discovered that the essential oils of aromatic plants are excellent therapeutic agents for treating fungal ailments. Candida species resistant to certain antifungals are an emerging problem.[ 15]
